Texts.Chs: 把^orange;50份硅^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 silicon^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Encouraging results! Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!
With a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^green;sand^reset; and extracting it to get ^orange;10 silicon^reset;.
